objects.title: CodeArena
objects.summary: A competitive auditing platform for Smart Contract Auditors to review smart contracts that are close to production deployement. There are incentives to finding High/Medium/Low vulernabilities as well as QA/Informational findings. Reports are often published after an audit has been completed and patched, allowing for further learning for the auditors on the platform.
bulletPoints: Finished in the top 500 for the year of 2022
Found a medium severity finding during the Forgotten Runes audit competition

objects.title: That Time I Found a Critical Web3 Bug
objects.summary: After witnessing countless protocols and projects get exploited by hackers, I decided to finally jump into the world of smart contract security. Luckily enough, one of the NFT projects that I was an active member of were starting a bug bounty for their next phase of the roadmap.
bulletPoints: Gained a mastery of the protocol after reading through every line of the new contracts
Reported a critical vulnerability that was accepted
Vulnerability would have lead to stolen of users' NFTs

objects.title: Read the Signs: The dangers of eth_sign
objects.summary: After almost falling victim to a fake Collab.Land bot, I dug deep into the Metamask source code and ventured into EIPs to understand how hacks similar to this can drain the wallets of unsuspecting users who approve a signature.
bulletPoints: Made a proof-of-concept of the attack
Reverse engineered an attack that uses raw eth_sign signatures in order to trick a user into signing a transaction that they don't know is harmful if approved
Dove into the Metamask source code, EIP 1559 and EIP 2718 to understand how transactions were created

objects.title: Blogs
objects.summary: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition
bulletPoints: Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation
Bring to the table win-win survival strategies to ensure proactive domination.
At the end of the day, going forward, a new normal that has evolved from generation X
